label: AB3_oP16_51_af_behk-001
title: $\alpha$-BiPd$_{3}$ Structure
comments:
This is the room temperature structure of BiPd. 
 Okamoto's phase diagram (Villars, 2018) shows a transition to a high-temperature phase at 800$^{\circ}$C, but says that no data is available for that structure. 
 (Schubert, 1968) puts one bismuth atom on the (2c) (0 0 1/2) Wyckoff position.  We shift this so that atom is at the origin, Wyckoff position (2a).
